import React from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import './Signup.css' function Signup(){ const submitHandler = (event) => { fetch(`http://localhost:9000/signup/${encodeURIComponent(event.currentTarget.elements.email.value)}/${encodeURIComponent(event.currentTarget.elements.password.value)}/${encodeURIComponent(event.currentTarget.elements.gender.value)}/${encodeURIComponent(event.currentTarget.elements.age.value)}/${encodeURIComponent(event.currentTarget.elements.height.value)}/${encodeURIComponent(event.currentTarget.elements.weight.value)}/1`) } return (

Sign Up

) } export default Signup;
